Component.Name: DBControl
Component.Description: CDPComponent is an instance of a CDP component model, instantiated using the specification in the component configuration xml file. Components communicate by exchanging Messages, Signal- and Property-values, both inside applications and between applications.

Alarm.Description: Alarm is triggered (with Text containing the list of errors) when some node of the component (like operator) has configuration fault.
Alarm.Name: ConfigurationFaults

ArgumentMessage.Description: Message out sending CM_TEXTCOMMAND_EVENT command with CM_TEXTCOMMAND by default.
ArgumentMessage.Name: MessageOut

Operator.Description: Basic Function Block is a Sequencer block that allows users to define sequencer block behaviour in configure mode. It is made up of states and transitions defining ECC and state-linked operations (https://www.eclipse.org/4diac/en_help.php?helppage=html/before4DIAC/iec61499.html)
Operator.Name: Delay

ArgumentMessage.Description: Block API item that is used to recieve Messages as events. Additionally in Basic and Service block to recieve argument data listed in its Data property and to trigger statemachine procesing of Basic blocks
ArgumentMessage.Name: In

ArgumentMessage.Description: Block API item that is used to send Messages. Additionally in Basic and Service block to send argument data by selectiong them in the event's Data property.
ArgumentMessage.Name: Out

Operation.Description: Sequencer RunScript for running short ChaiScripts instead of running operator based logic to do calculations
Operation.Name: RunScr0

Operator.Name: CreateRes

ArgumentMessage.Description: Block API item to send or receive Messages as events for sequencer processing.

ArgumentMessage.Name: QueryFailed

Operator.Name: CreateSteps
Operator.Query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS steps ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, recipe_id INTEGER, Joint1Angle REAL, Joint2Angle REAL, Joint3Angle REAL, Joint4Angle REAL, Joint5Angle REAL, Joint6Angle REAL, GripperClosed INTEGER, Duration REAL, FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(id) );

Operation.Description: Refers to operation to run when entering a Sequencer State.
Operation.Name: RunOp0

Operator.Description: Sequencer Operation operator is a container for operator logic with Done event that is emited after each operation run.
Operator.Name: FrwUpdate

ArgumentMessage.Description: Message Done sent each run. By default sends CM_TEXTCOMMAND_EVENT command with CM_TEXTCOMMAND.
ArgumentMessage.Name: Done

Operator.Name: UpdateStepById
Operator.Query: UPDATE steps SET Joint1Angle = ?, Joint2Angle = ?, Joint3Angle = ?, Joint4Angle = ?, Joint5Angle = ?, Joint6Angle = ?, GripperClosed = ?, Duration = ? WHERE id = ?;

Operator.Name: SelectPreviousStepById
Operator.Query: SELECT * FROM steps WHERE id < ? AND recipe_id = ? ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;
